articles.content:
Spoilers follow for the film Dont Worry Darling. 
At a certain point in criticism, one must put gossip aside and dig into a piece of work on its own merits. This past weekend, Olivia Wildes sophomor… [+13257 chars]

articles.author: Madeline Roth
articles.title: Melanie C Wants the Spice Girls to Play Coachella - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Melanie Chisholm tells The Daily Beast about her (excellent) new memoir and answers all our burning questions about “Spice World,” possible upcoming reunions, and more.
articles.content:
You may think you know Melanie Chisholm, but to quote a bygone MTV series of the Spice Girls era, you have no idea.
Enter The Sporty One, Chisholms revealing new memoir, which comes out Tuesday in t… [+21257 chars]
